name: KnowledgeBuster
overview:
Offering free exam prep for Microsoft, CompTIA, Cisco, VMware, PMI, and more.

As IT professionals and educators, KnowledgeBuster.com is dedicated to assisting, promoting and enhancing the value of IT certifications. All of the material used by KnowledgeBuster is current and proprietary. We are not a ‘brain dump’ and would not recommend IT certification candidates to pursue their credentials in that fasion. Those types of services only devalue certifications.

Our primary motivation is to provide our members with the computer certification resources and foremost IT information to help them achieve their certification and IT career goals.

“When I first got into the IT field, I was amazed by the amount of information out there, a lot of resources claiming to be free that werenâ€™t and a medley of just plain useless websites. I wanted to change that. I wanted to provide quality, up to date content that was NOT a brain dump.” -FFD, founder of KnowledgeBuster

If you are looking for even more resources we welcome your communication and information exchange at our Forum that is open to all. We are committed to providing the most up to date content and information to assist you in achieving your certifications.

What are you waiting for? Itâ€™s FREE, UNLIMITED (you can take as many exams as you want) and there are no downloading hassles.
